## createQueryStringifier variable

Creates URL query stringifier. The creator function takes an array of parameter stringifier functions to be called on each string formatted parameter. Fhe first troothy returned value will be used as stringified value for source parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createQueryStringifier: (parameterStringifiers: Stringifier<Parameter>[]) => Stringifier<Parameter[]>
```
